name: displayops-management-system
description: DisplayOps Management System - Complete solution for managing displays

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix host-agent && npm install --prefix web-admin && npm install --prefix web-controller
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ADMIN,CONTROLLER,HOST" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:controller" "npm run dev:host"
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:controller && npm run build:host
scripts.start: concurrently --names "ADMIN,CONTROLLER,HOST" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:controller" "npm run start:host"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:controller && npm run lint:host
scripts.clean: npm run clean:admin && npm run clean:controller && npm run clean:host

author: DisplayOps Management System
